datamodel

Class Delivery

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.Delivery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IObserver, ISubject

    public class Delivery
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubject, IObserver, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a delivery / consignment that is or has been handled by the courier company. It provides a means to track the delivery and bill the customer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static double DEFAULTCOST
      Defines the default delivery cost per 1 KG.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Delivery()
      Default constructor required for serialisation initialises consignment number to UNKNOWN, cost per KG to the default cost, collection date to the current date, notes to empty string, and the delivery status to pending collection.
      Delivery(java.lang.String consNo, int packageCount, double weight, Address colAddress, Address delAddress)
      Constructor setting consignment number, package count, weight, collection address and delivery address of a delivery to given values.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULTCOST

        protected static final double DEFAULTCOST
        Defines the default delivery cost per 1 KG. Used when a customer does not have an agreed cost for shipping.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Delivery

        public Delivery()
        Default constructor required for serialisation initialises consignment number to UNKNOWN, cost per KG to the default cost, collection date to the current date, notes to empty string, and the delivery status to pending collection.

      • Delivery

        public Delivery(java.lang.String consNo,
        int packageCount,
        double weight,
        Address colAddress,
        Address delAddress)
        Constructor setting consignment number, package count, weight, collection address and delivery address of a delivery to given values.
        Parameters:
        consNo - - String being the value to set the consignment number.
        packageCount - - Integer being the number of packages in this delivery.
        weight - - A double representing the weight of the delivery.
        colAddress - - Address object holding the collection address of the delivery.
        delAddress - - -Address object holding the delivery/destination address of the delivery.

      • getDeliveredDate

        public java.util.Date getDeliveredDate()
        Accessor method to retrieve the date on which the driver made delivery of the packages(s) either to the destination or if the package(s) where returned to the customer.
        Returns:
        - Date on which the driver made delivery of the packages(s) either to the destination or if the package(s) where returned to the customer. If delivery is still active then date is null.

      • setDeliveredDate

        public void setDeliveredDate(java.util.Date deliveredDate)
        Accessor method to store the date on which the driver made delivery of the packages(s) either to the destination or if the package(s) where returned to the customer and updates the status to delivered.
        Parameters:
        deliveredDate - - Date value to be stored as the date on which the driver made delivery of the packages(s) either to the destination or if the package(s) where returned to the customer.

      • appendToNotes

        public void appendToNotes(java.lang.String newNote)
        This method appends the newNote string to the comma separated list of strings stored in the notes attribute.
        Parameters:
        newNote - - String holding the new notes to append to the comma separated list of strings stored in the notes attribute.

      • getTotalCost

        public double getTotalCost()
        This method calculates the total cost of making the delivery. Total cost is defined as the chargeable weight of the delivery multiplied by the cost per a KG. (Total Cost = weight * costPerKg).
        Returns:
        - A double representing the total cost of making the delivery.

      • registerObserver

        public java.lang.Boolean registerObserver(IObserver o)
        Description copied from interface: ISubject
        This method registers a new observer with the subject. After this method completes successfully the newly registered object will receive notifications to update when the state of this subject object is changed.
        Specified by:
        registerObserver in interface ISubject
        Parameters:
        o - - The object that needs to receive notification of changes to this subjects state
        Returns:
        - Boolean True if the provided object has been added to the list of observers and will receive notification when this subject changes state, False otherwise.

      • removeObserver

        public java.lang.Boolean removeObserver(IObserver o)
        Description copied from interface: ISubject
        This method removes an object from the list of objects receiving notification of state changes to this subject object.
        Specified by:
        removeObserver in interface ISubject
        Parameters:
        o - - The object that no longer needs to receive notification of changes to this subjects state.
        Returns:
        - Boolean True if this object will not receive notification of changes to this subjects state, False otherwise.
